          <title>
            <string language="en">Convection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konvektion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Convection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Convection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Convezione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταφορά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Convección</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an experimental setup used to demonstrate the convection of water in a beaker using potassium manganate (VII) crystal.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">convection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potassium manganate (vii) crystal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thistle funnels</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine experimentelle 
Installation, die verwendet wird, um die Konvektion des Wassers in 
einem Becher mit Kristall des Kaliummanganats zu demonstrieren (vii).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une installation 
expérimentale employée pour démontrer la convection de l'eau dans 
un becher en utilisant le cristal du manganate de potassium (vii).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação 
experimental usada demonstrar o convection da água em uma taça 
usando o cristal do manganate de potassium (vii).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto 
sperimentale usata per dimostrare la convezione di acqua in una coppa 
usando il cristallo del manganato di potassio (vii).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πειραματική οργάνωση που 
χρησιμοποιείται για να καταδείξει τη μεταφορά του ύδατος σε μια 
κούπα χρησιμοποιώντας manganate καλίου (VII) κρύσταλλο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una disposición 
experimental usada para demostrar la convección del agua en un 
cubilete usando el cristal del manganato de potasio (vii).</string>
          </description>
